# Project Gene Analysis
## Outline

1. __Data Processing:__ First we [read the SOEP-I data into R](https://lisallreiber.github.io/GeneAnalysis/00_import_data.html), 
and create the datasets needded for further analysis.
2. __Data Description:__ Here we can look at some [descriptive plots](https://lisallreiber.github.io/GeneAnalysis/p1_0102_describe_plots_v36.html) and [frequency tables](https://lisallreiber.github.io/GeneAnalysis/p1_0202_describe_tables_v36.html) of the iGENE Sample.
3. __Data Analysis:__ Future
4. __Documentation:__ [Here](https://lisallreiber.github.io/GeneAnalysis/00_codebook.html) you can find an example codebook of the underlying data. (Created with the [codebook package](https://github.com/rubenarslan/codebook) by Ruben Arslan)
